_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: GregTech:New Horizons
author: DJSchaffner@outlook.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server || exit 1

GTNH_VERSION="${GTNH_VERSION// /}"
AVAILABLE_VERSIONS=$(curl -s https://downloads.gtnewhorizons.com/ServerPacks/?raw)
FILTERED_VERSIONS=$(echo -e "$AVAILABLE_VERSIONS" | grep -v -e 'Java_8.zip' | grep $([[ ${IS_BETA_VERSION:-0} -ne 1 ]] && echo "-v ") -e '/betas/')

if [[ "$GTNH_VERSION" != "latest" ]]; then
  echo -e "Constructing download link for specified version $GTNH_VERSION"
  # Use tail just to make sure there are not multiple versions matching
  DOWNLOAD_LINK="$(echo -e "$FILTERED_VERSIONS" | grep -e _"$GTNH_VERSION"_)"
else
  echo -e "No version specified. Getting latest available version"
  DOWNLOAD_LINK="$(echo -e "$FILTERED_VERSIONS" | tail -n 1)"
fi

echo -e "Download link: $DOWNLOAD_LINK"
ZIP_FILE=GTNH_${GTNH_VERSION}.zip

if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail "$DOWNLOAD_LINK"; then
  echo -e "Download link is valid"
else
  echo -e "Invalid download link - Check provided GT:NH version. Exiting now!"
  exit 1
fi

echo -e "Backing up [${DELUPDATEEXLUDE}]"
mkdir tmpBackup
cp -rafv --parents ${DELUPDATEEXLUDE} -t tmpBackup | sed 's/^/\t/'

echo -e "Removing files from previous installation; [${DELUPDATE}]"
echo -e "Only printing directories until 1 deep, and top level files."
rm -rfv ${DELUPDATE} | grep -E "directory[^/]+\/[^/]*$|^[^/]+$" | sed 's/^/\t/'

echo -e "Downloading archive"
curl -o "$ZIP_FILE" "$DOWNLOAD_LINK"

echo -e "Start extracting archive"
timeout 60s unzip -nq "$ZIP_FILE"
if [ $? -ge 124 ]; then
    echo "Extraction was unsuccessful or timed out!"
    exit 1
fi

echo -e "Restoring backed up files"
cp -rafv -t ./ tmpBackup/* | sed 's/^/\t/'
rm -rfv tmpBackup | sed 's/^/\t/'

chmod +x lwjgl3ify-forgePatches.jar
chmod +x forge-*.jar



echo -e "Deleting zip file"
rm -f "$ZIP_FILE"
rm -rf "$CONFIG_DIR_BACKUP"

echo -e "Installation process is completed"

variables.name: GT:NH Version
variables.description:
The version of GregTech:New Horizons to use. Set to "latest" for latest version, or specify a version number.
Example: 2.7.0

variables.name: Use Beta Version
variables.description: Enable if you want to use a beta version

variables.name: Delete During Install / Reinstall
variables.description: These files will be deleted during install / reinstall
variables.default_value: config libraries mods resources scripts lwjgl3ify-forgePatches.jar java9args.txt startserver-java9.bat startserver-java9.sh

variables.name: Do not delete these during Install / Reinstall
variables.description:
Use this to prevent the script from deleting them during install / reinstall. Useful to prevent items inside folders which are deleted from being deleted
Example: config/JourneyMapServer
